title: React.js CLI
description: A CLI React component to interact with Upstash Redis databases.

body.raw: `@upstash/react-ui` is powering the CLI in your browser on [console.upstash.com](https://console.upstash.com). It allows you to interact with your Upstash Redis database in a simple and intuitive way.
